Question: AI Collaborator CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AI Collaborator

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- AI-powered Gaming Sync Box Kit 2
- On-device generative AI capabilities for natural and intuitive user experiences
- Samsung Neo QLED 8K with advanced AI processor
- The Premiere 8K projector featuring AI technology
- AI enhancements in home kitchen automation
- AI PCs designed for new levels of performance
- Support for AI in robotic vacuum cleaners (Matter support for robovacs in 1.2 spec)
- Use of generative AI in event's primary visuals
